gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: ACR3L2DM > ACRIM III Level 2 Daily Mean Data

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: ACRIM III Level 2 Daily Mean Data

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: The research producing this EOS/ACRIM III experiment collection was supervised by Dr. Richard C. Willson, Principal Investigator, sponsored by Columbia University and funded by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration under contract NAS5-97164.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This file contains Level 2 total solar irradiance in the form of daily means gathered by the ACRIM instrument on the ACRIMSAT satellite. Version Description: Initial Version

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This collection is comprised of processed daily mean data collected by the ACRIMSAT spacecraft. This collection is ACRIM III results of total solar irradiance.
